We need torrents like this so as to build a more decentralized and self-reliant Internet culture that is less prone to potential censorship and other foul play.  Legal P2P traffic helps legitimize P2P protocols and keep ISP's from blocking it.  So huge kudos to everyone who uploads and seeds quality video.
